title: Did Mark McCluskey ever destroy a neighboring squirrels?
subtitle: Mark McCluskey and his wife Patricia were notoriously exposed to two weapons during a racist protest of injustice outside the Missouri Palace in 2020.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: Mark McCluskey, a man from Missouri who was famous for throwing a firearm at demonstrators in 2020, destroyed the nearby church beehive seven years ago because the buildings crossed his property line.
